name: UNNotificationInterruptionLevel
desc: Constants that indicate the importance and delivery timing of a notification.

items.name: case active
items.desc: The system presents the notification immediately, lights up the screen, and can play a sound.

items.name: case critical
items.desc: The system presents the notification immediately, lights up the screen, and bypasses the mute switch to play a sound.

items.name: case passive
items.desc: The system adds the notification to the notification list without lighting up the screen or playing a sound.

items.name: case timeSensitive
items.desc: The system presents the notification immediately, lights up the screen, and can play a sound, but wonâ€™t break through system notification controls.
